Pre-Game Insights: England has momentum after a massive win in the last game which gives them a narrow edge over their opposition.
The rivalry between these two nations has been intense, with England holding a slight edge, winning six out of their last ten encounters against South Africa.
Both teams are brimming with confidence, setting the stage for a tightly contested match.
